import React from 'react'; import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import './Calculator.css'; import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers/yup'; import * as yup from "yup"; const validationCalc = yup.object().shape({ plano: yup.string().required(), origem: yup.string().required(), destino: yup.string().required(), duracao: yup.integer().required() }); function Calculator() { const {register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(validationCalc) }); const calcTarifa = data => { console.log(data); }; return (

Calcule o valor de suas chamadas com ou sem plano!

{errors.plano?.message}

{errors.origem?.message}

{errors.destino?.message}

{errors.duracao?.message}

) } export default Calculator
